org.ambraproject.wombat.config

Class JsonConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ambraproject.wombat.config.JsonConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RuntimeConfiguration

    public class JsonConfiguration
extends Object
implements RuntimeConfiguration
    Configuration for the webapp's runtime behavior. Because most configuration of application behavior should be behind the service layer, this class ought to be concerned only with the minimal set of values that concern how this Spring app interacts with the service API.
    See Also:
    SpringConfiguration#runtimeConfiguration

      • devModeAssets

        public boolean devModeAssets()
        Specified by:
        devModeAssets in interface RuntimeConfiguration
        Returns:
        true if we are running in "dev mode" for .js and .css, and compilation/minification should not happen for these files

      • getCompiledAssetDir

        public String getCompiledAssetDir()
        Specified by:
        getCompiledAssetDir in interface RuntimeConfiguration
        Returns:
        the directory in which to write and serve compiled assets (.js and .css). Not relevant if devModeAssets is true.

      • getMemcachedHost

        public String getMemcachedHost()
        Specified by:
        getMemcachedHost in interface RuntimeConfiguration
        Returns:
        the memcached host, or null if it is not present in the config

        Specified by:
        getMemcachedPort in interface RuntimeConfiguration
        Returns:

      • getCacheAppPrefix

        public String getCacheAppPrefix()
        Specified by:
        getCacheAppPrefix in interface RuntimeConfiguration
        Returns:
        the cacheAppPrefix value, or null if it is not defined in the config. This should be a String that is shared by all wombat app servers, defining a namespace for them.

      • getThemes

        public ThemeTree getThemes(Collection<? extends Theme> internalThemes,
                  Theme rootTheme)
                    throws ThemeTree.ThemeConfigurationException
        Parse the user-defined themes.
        Specified by:
        getThemes in interface RuntimeConfiguration
        Parameters:
        internalThemes - constant themes provided by the webapp
        rootTheme - the default parent theme to be applied to any user-defined theme without an explicit parent
        Returns:
        the set of all available themes
        Throws:
        ThemeTree.ThemeConfigurationException
